Koreans love shopping and visitors will find so many options.
Seoul has entire neighborhoods dedicated to shopping,...
...from the liveliest night markets to expensive department stores.
Even with the hustle and bustle of a big city,...
...the people of Seoul can still find peace beside the Cheonggyecheon stream...
The heart of this modern mega city is buried deep in the past...
...and gives visitors a dazzling richness of experiences...
...that will remain in your thoughts for years.
